title: Welcome to Wayward Wander
description: A quick tutorial quest in Washington, DC. Learn how to use the app while visiting iconic landmarks. Use the 'Stuck?' button to progress if you're not in DC!

clues.initialClue: Your first destination: Find the tall white obelisk that honors America's first president. It stands at the center of the National Mall and can be seen from miles away.

hints.content: TUTORIAL: Hints are revealed one at a time. Tap 'Get Hint' when you need help. This landmark is 555 feet tall and made of marble.
NOT IN DC? No problem! Tap the 'Stuck?' button below to skip ahead and continue the tutorial.

reveal.text:
You found the Washington Monument!

When you arrive at a location, you'll see this 'reveal' screen with photos and information about what you discovered.

Tap 'Continue' below to proceed to the next clue.

clues.initialClue:
Excellent progress!

Now head west along the Reflecting Pool to find the memorial honoring the 16th President, who preserved the Union during the Civil War.

He sits in contemplation, watching over the Mall.

hints.content: TUTORIAL: Different hint types help in different ways. Text hints give clues, the compass points the direction, and distance shows how far away you are.
The memorial features a 19-foot marble statue. Remember: tap 'Stuck?' at the bottom if you want to skip ahead!

reveal.text:
You found the Lincoln Memorial!

Did you notice how the compass arrow guided you here? It always points toward your destination.

One more stop to complete the tutorial!

clues.initialClue:
Final destination!

Head back east toward the Washington Monument. Between Lincoln and Washington, you'll find a memorial with a fountain, surrounded by pillars representing each U.S. state and territory.

It honors the generation that fought in the 1940s.

hints.content: TUTORIAL: Quest creators can add passcodes to clues. You might need to find a word at the location or receive a passcode from your guide.
Look for the World War II Memorial with its Atlantic and Pacific pavilions. Use 'Stuck?' to finish the tutorial!

reveal.text:
You found the World War II Memorial!

Congratulations on completing the tutorial!

Now you know how Wayward Wander works:
• Follow clues to find locations
• Use hints when you need help
• The compass and distance guide you
• Discover reveals when you arrive

Tip: Long-press any quest on the home screen to share or delete it. Once you've completed a quest, you can also edit it to see how it was built!

Try creating your own quest, or import quests from friends!
